const challans = context.item.data.challans || [];
return challans.length + ' pending challan' + (challans.length !== 1 ? 's' : '');

en.code:
const date = context.item.data?.date ? new Date(context.item.data.date) : null;
return date ? date.toLocaleDateString() + ' ' + date.toLocaleTimeString([], {hour: '2-digit', minute:'2-digit'}) : '';
